  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Each)
      (NP (NN year)))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS families))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ ieat) (NN committee))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB organize)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (NN makan) (NN session))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (NNP Good) (NNP Friday))))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB celebrate)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN life)
                  (CC and)
                  (NN death))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Jesus)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(families-3, a-1)
amod(families-3, few-2)
nsubj(organize-9, families-3)
prep(families-3, in-4)
det(committee-7, the-5)
amod(committee-7, ieat-6)
pobj(in-4, committee-7)
aux(organize-9, will-8)
root(ROOT-0, organize-9)
det(session-13, a-10)
amod(session-13, special-11)
nn(session-13, makan-12)
dobj(organize-9, session-13)
prep(session-13, on-14)
nn(Friday-16, Good-15)
pobj(on-14, Friday-16)
aux(celebrate-18, to-17)
xcomp(organize-9, celebrate-18)
det(life-20, the-19)
dobj(celebrate-18, life-20)
cc(life-20, and-21)
conj(life-20, death-22)
prep(life-20, of-23)
pobj(of-23, Jesus-24)

  (UCP
    (NP (DT the) (NN universe))
    (CC and)

      (WHADVP (WRB how))
      (S
        (NP
          (NP (NNS events))
          (VP (VBG happening)
            (PP (IN around)
              (NP (DT the) (NN world)))))
        (VP (VBZ fits)
          (PP (IN into)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ big) (NN scheme))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNS things)))))))
      (. .))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the)
      (ADJP (RB over))
      (NN riding) (NN theme))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ great) (NNP Japan) (NN Earthquake))
          (CC and)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Tsunami))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ has)
                  (VP (VBN caused)
                    (NP
                      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ much))
                      (NN devastation)
                      (CC and)
                      (NN damage))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP$ Our) (NN ieat) (NN community))
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (VP (VBN tried)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB do)
                (NP (PRP$ our) (NN part))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG helping)
                      (S
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NNS people))
                        (VP (VB rebuild)
                          (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS lives))
                          (PP (IN by)
                            (S
                              (VP (VBG raising)
                                (NP (DT some) (NNS funds))

                                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NN durian) (NN degustation)))))))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN written)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (NNS posts))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB help)
                (VP (VB encourage)
                  (S
                    (NP (NNS people))
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB continue)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB support)
                              (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NNS people))
                              (PP (IN by)
                                (S
                                  (VP (VBG eating)
                                    (NP (RBR more) (JJ Japanese) (NN food))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VB invite)

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB come)
              (VP (VB join)
                (NP (PRP us))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN morning))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN fellowship)
                        (CC and)
                        (NN food)))))))))))

      (INTJ (VB please))
      (VP (VB feel)
        (ADJP (JJ free)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB bring)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS friends)
                  (CC and)
                  (NN family))
                (PRT (RP along))))))))
    (. !)))
